body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Biography","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Consisting of four incredibly talented and well respected industry musicians, the band have performed extensively across Europe and the US and have played alongside artists such as Feeder, Bastille and Ben Howard. The band are no strangers when it comes to performing at high class events, with live performances for ITV, major British sports teams and even a private function for Richard Branson under their belts.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Well adapted to bringing the party feel, The Tricks fuse together a perfect blend of signature high-octane sets combing both old and new alike. From Ray Charles to Bruno Mars the band have a broad range of material always guaranteed to keep an event in full swing.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Scroll down the repertoire to view the full list of songs including a number of expertly executed medleys which are guaranteed to bring down the house! (Medleys suitable for 4-piece band only)","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Enquire now to book The Tricks, and be safe in the fact that you are getting truly one of the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"best party bands","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.bandsforhire.net/party-bands"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" out there on the circuit today.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

pageContext.title: Nexus Band
pageContext.description: Get ready for the night of your life with this most wanted band.

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Biography","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Antony is the ideal choice if you're looking to add some ambiance to your wedding breakfast, drinks reception or corporate drinks reception.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"His repertoire includes many popular numbers from the rich jazz repertoire, just take a look  at a sample in the left-hand column.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you're venue doesn't have a trumpet, Antony is able to bring it and amp at no extra cost.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There is also the option to add additional jazz musicians to the line-up from double bass to sax or vocalists. If you're interested in a full band line-up, please take a look at Antony's ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Jazz trio","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.bandsforhire.net/jazz-swing-bands/item/31-jazz-report"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
